author: Un Petit Feu
text:
Worst experience ever. The support is a total joke. Don't buy on this website unless you want to throw your money by the window.

I have purchased an Air Jordan pair of shoes and I never received the product. The Post Office said it was delivered but I've never seen the colour of the package nor the pair of shoes, which I paid €150 for. 

I warned Vinted support about that and they kept sending me the same message over and over again ("We're sorry to hear that you didn't receive the product, please contact the post office"). I asked the Post Office to make an investigation to know where the package was. I sent Vinted support a proof that I opened an investigation case. The investigation isn't finished yet, but they closed the litigation on Vinted between the seller and me, even if the Post Office didn't give me an answer about the result of the investigation. 

So the seller received his money and I paid for nothing. I asked them but they said that "the Post Office said it was delivered so it's delivered". 

Luckily I paid with PayPal, so I opened a litigation case with PayPal. I warned the Vinted support about that and they said that "according to their Terms and Conditions", my account may be blocked. BECAUSE I OPENED A LITIGATION CASE ON PAYPAL. 

Anyway. I'm asking for my money back and they don't have proof to give to justify the closure of the litigation. 

They threatened me to block my account but they can, actually I don't care at all and I won't buy on this website EVER AGAIN.
title: Worst experience ever

author: Marylou Chenu
text:
Site à fuir, je n'ai jamais reçu ma commande car le site ne m'a jamais dit que l'expédition avait été faite (Ils indiquent pourtant qu'un message va nous être envoyé au moment de l'expédition par le vendeur). Cependant, j'ai bien payé le vendeur, je voulas donc un remboursement. Voici ce qu'ils m'ont répondu: 


 "Hello Marylou,

I'm sorry this deal hasn't worked out as planned.

Unfortunately, I’m no longer able to suspend this transaction since the payment has already been released to your seller. 😞 

We really care about safety and always give buyers 2 days after the order is marked as delivered to let us know if anything goes wrong by simply clicking the "J'ai un problème"  button. You’ll get the option to contact our support team. From there we'll be able to investigate further.

Please contact your seller about this. Many sellers are happy to offer a replacement item or a refund! Please note, if you agree on a refund, the seller will need to refund you externally (via PayPal or bank transfer) since the funds are no longer on Vinted. 

I hope this helps and I hope your next purchase will go as planned, 🌼 


Ieva || Support Team"
title: Site à fuir

author: AS
text:
Not worth it

It's not worth the time, unless you want to sell things that aren't really worth much or that you don't care about. If you try to sell a luxury item, they'll take it off the website and then ask for proof that the item is authentic, they'll ask you to add pictures of the tag and so forth. However, even after doing exactly what they ask you to do, they still won't add the item back to the website. And on top of that, there's no way to contact them to ask why they're not putting it back.
title: Not worth it

author: Louise D
text:
AVOID AT ALL COSTS. Extremely bad company. Sellers are not protected against scams at all.

I sold one coat (value RRP 150€) on Vinted last year, the coat was exactly as described in my listing. The buyer complained to Vinted saying (and lying!) that the size was not correct and not as described. The story behind this is that she clearly lied and said that as an excuse to return the item because she didn't like the coat. 
Despite all the proofs I sent to Vinted, the buyer was authorized by Vinted to send me the coat back. The buyer had her refund, I lost my money and she apparently sent the coat back with Mondial Relay: the 150€ coat never arrived to me and has been lost (or stolen?). I lost my money, my coat has been lost and I have not received any compensation or any money back from Vinted. The buyer lied, Vinted trusted her without any proofs. 

Vinted doesn't protect the sellers agains scams at all, I don't recommend anyone to use it.  

It is impossible to have a discussion with a person working for Vinted as you only receive meaningless automatic/robotic replies to your complaints. There is absolutely no customer service. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.
title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS: SELLERS ARE NOT PROTECTED, MANY SCAMS, NO COMPENSATION FOR SELLERS, AUTOMATIC REPLIES, NO CUSTOMER SERVICE

author: Review101
text: Disgraceful app. I hope majority of people will see this and decide not to download the app. It’s a scam website. They ignore you when you are being scammed by people and allow the scamming to happen. The last two times my items have been sold on there, I paid postage for the items and also paid for them to need signatures. The buyers have just decided they didn’t like the item basically and pretended it hasn’t delivered yet despite it saying different on tracking and with there also being a signature given when it was delivered. Then, a few days later deciding actually now it’s came but this is wrong and they have damaged my items and sent images of the vandalism they have done to my item and with these images been allowed to send them back to me IN THIS CONDITION. I was threatened by the site that my account could be terminated because of the fact my items ‘weren’t as described’ numerous times. They also let the buyers keep the item and also get a refund so you are left without your item neither the money you were promised and the buyer gets given your item for free. It’s absolutely ridiculous honestly. Don’t ever sell your stuff on here. They literally don’t respond to your messages if you send a couple to them if they haven’t responded the first time. No help at all. You are literally ignored when asking for help. Anyone who works for this website should be disgusted with themselves watching and allowing people to be scammed. This is a sin.
title: AVOID AVOID AVOID
